Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.development

Class Developments

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.development.Developments
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus, WinPointsCountable
public class Developments extends Object implements HasStatus, WinPointsCountable, AcceptsSupplies
The class has the responsibility to manage the three development spaces on the board. You can add a card to a specified development space, and you can activate the production on the specified spaces. The class also has functions to get information about the cards in the 3 development spaces.

    • getInput

      public SupplyContainer getInput​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3)
      Returns the sum of the inputs needed by the last development cards contained in the development space indicated.
      Parameters:
      s1 - development space 1
      s2 - development space 2
      s3 - development space 3
      Returns:
      the sum of the inputs indicated

    • produce

      public SupplyContainer produce​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3)
      Activate the production on the specified development spaces.
      Parameters:
      s1 - produce on space 1? True/False
      s2 - produce on space 2? True/False
      s3 - produce on space 3? True/False
      Returns:
      The sum of all the productions.

    • checkProduction

      public void checkProduction​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3) throws SupplyException
      Checks if there is the exact amount of supplies on the specified development spaces. If everything is ok, no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      s1 - produce on space 1? True/False
      s2 - produce on space 2? True/False
      s3 - produce on space 3? True/False
      Throws:
      SupplyException - On one of the active spaces there isn't the right amount of supplies.

    • addSupply

      public void addSupply​(DepotID space, WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from) throws SupplyException
      Adds the specified supply to the specified development space.
      Specified by:
      addSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      space - where to add the supply to
      wot - type of supply to add
      from - Source of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The card on the specified space doesn't accept this type of supply, or there is enough supply of the specified type on the card.

    • addCardToSpace

      public void addCardToSpace​(int space, DevelopmentCard card) throws DevelopmentException
      Tries to add the specified card to the specified space.
      Parameters:
      space - where to add the card to
      card - card to add
      Throws:
      DevelopmentException - Card level doesn't match required level, or the space is full (max is 3 cards). [pre: space is between 0 and 2]
